amendment.description: Amendment replaced section 9012 of the bill with a new section 9012 entitled, "Sense of Congress and Report Concerning Religious Freedom and Tolerance at United States Air Force Academy".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 9012 currently printed in the bill and to insert a new section 9012 entitled "Sense of Congress and Report Concerning Religious Freedom and Tolerance at United States Air Force Academy.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
